title: What decides the date a Pixel warranty runs from (and to)?
content:
Just bought a new, sealed sim-free unlocked 3a from authorised UK seller (our biggest electronics retailer). That entitles you to two year warranty says Google's page. 

Entering IMEI at Google Store repair page, it says cover ends 7 May 2022. 

So what happened on 8 May 2020 to set the clock ticking?
